title: Masterys are messed up
body: For some reason my mastery lvl and mastery points wont show when i go to collection but on profile its all good

replies.body: Sorry to keep you waiting! There was an issue with Masteries, but it has sense been resolved. In the future you can always check our [Server Status Page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for updates on issues that occur within the client.
It's a bug and they are already working on a fix^^
